title: Systems Design Competency Enhancement: Mobile-Based Science Field Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design a systematic process for analyzing real-world problems in science using mobile devices.
Learners can propose actionable solutions for scientific problem-solving based on data collected in information-centric environments.
Learners can improve projects by exchanging real-time feedback with team members using mobile collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
